forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear this evening. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 9C. ESE winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 47F. ESE winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 46F. NW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
